TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartChrome extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许开发人员仅重写 区域中 或服务器控件的选定部分的呈现。

span.span: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of or server controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件 chrome 指的是 在区域中包含的每个控件或服务器控件的外围用户界面 (UI) 元素。Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each control or server control contained in a zone. 控件的 chrome 包含其边框、标题栏和标题栏中显示的图标、标题文本和谓词菜单。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. Chrome 的外观是在区域级别设置的, 并应用于区域中的所有服务器控件。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the server controls in the zone. Web 部件控件集使用类呈现控件的 chrome。The Web Parts control set uses the class to render the chrome for controls. 此外, 此类提供了一种方法, 使开发人员可以自定义 区域中控件的任何单个部分 (如页眉或页脚), 而无需处理这些控件的所有呈现。Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any individual section (such as the header or footer) of the controls in a zone without having to handle all the rendering for those controls. 例如, 可以重写方法以自定义应用于该区域的某些特定样式属性, 但可以依赖于默认呈现来处理其余内容。For example, you can override the method to customize some specific style attributes applied to the zone, but you can rely on the default rendering to handle the rest. 类包含若干重要的方法, 当您想要重写控件的呈现时, 这些方法非常有用。 The class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of controls. 其中一种方法是方法, 该方法使您可以更改与用于呈现控件的对象相关联的对象的样式特性。One is the method, which enables you to change the style attributes of the object associated with the object used to render a control. 另一个是构造函数, 当你在自定义类中重写方法以创建自定义对象的实例时, 将使用该构造函数。Another is the constructor, which you use when you override the method in a custom class to create an instance of your custom object. 另一种有用的方法是方法, 它可用于控制区域中控件的内容区域 (而不是诸如页眉、页脚和标题栏等 chrome 元素) 的呈现。Another useful method is the method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars). 如果出于某种原因而不希望用户在用户界面中查看这些谓词, 则可以通过方法排除呈现某些谓词。The method enables you to exclude certain verbs from being rendered, if for some reason you do not want users to see those verbs in the UI. 最后, 如果要对呈现控件的所有方面进行完全的编程控制, 可以重写方法。Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the controls, you can override the method. 类的多个属性也很有用。Several properties of the class are also useful. 和属性分别提供对与对象和当前实例相关联的区域的引用。 The and properties provide references to the zone associated with the object and the current instance, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来重写区域中控件的默认呈现。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to override the default rendering of controls in a zone. 此代码示例包含四个部分:The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 承载示例中的所有控件的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls in the example. - 一个包含自定义区域和类的源代码的类。A class that contains the source code for a custom zone and a class. - 此示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control. 该用户控件的源代码来自其他主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 要使此代码示例正常运行, 需要从[演练中获取用户控件的 .ascx 文件:更改 Web 部件页面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主题的显示模式, 并将该文件放在此代码示例中 .aspx 页面所在的同一文件夹中。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 该示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the example is the Web page. 请注意, 在文件`Register`顶部附近有一个指令, 用于注册编译的组件和一个标记前缀。Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the file to register the compiled component and a tag prefix. 另请注意, 页面使用元素``引用自定义区域, 并且在区域内包含多个标准 ASP.NET 服务器控件。Also note that the page references the custom zone using the element `` and includes several standard ASP.NET server controls within the zone. 服务器控件不实现任何实际功能;此处仅用于说明类功能适用于呈现区域的方式。The server controls do not implement any actual functionality; they are used here only to illustrate how the class features apply to rendering zones. 请注意, 这些服务器控件虽然不是实际的控件, 但每个都是在运行时使用对象自动包装 (通过 ASP.NET), 因此它们具有与控件相同的功能。Note that these server controls, though they are not actual controls, are each automatically wrapped (by ASP.NET) with a object at run time, so they will have the same functionality as controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/webpartchromecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/webpartchromevb.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是自定义区域和类的源。The third part of the code example is the source for the custom zone and a class. 在自定义区域类的构造函数中, 代码会检查`MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu`属性。In the constructor for the custom zone class, the code checks the `MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu` property. 如果值为`true`, 则在区域中的每个控件的菜单中呈现谓词。If the value is `true`, verbs are rendered in a menu for each of the controls in the zone. 这是 Web 部件控件集中的正常默认行为。This is the normal, default behavior in the Web Parts controls set. 如果属性值为`false`(在此自定义区域中为默认值), 则谓词将作为每个控件的标题栏中的链接单独呈现。 `MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu`If the `MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu` property value is `false`, which is the default in this custom zone, the verbs are rendered individually as links in the title bar of each control. 请注意, 在声明了``元素的网页代码中, `RenderVerbsInMenu`属性设置为`true`, 以便谓词出现在控件上的菜单中。Notice that in the Web page code where the `` element is declared, there is a `RenderVerbsInMenu` attribute set to `true`, so that the verbs will appear in menus on the controls. 若要尝试此功能, 可以将声明性`RenderVerbsInMenu`特性设置为`false`, 并注意谓词呈现为链接的方式。To experiment with this feature, you can set the declarative `RenderVerbsInMenu` attribute to `false`, and note how the verbs are rendered as links. 自定义类在多个方法上重写呈现, 而自定义区域在其方法`MyWebPartChrome`中创建类的一个实例。The custom class overrides the rendering on several methods, and the custom zone creates an instance of the `MyWebPartChrome` class in its method. 这会将自定义呈现应用于页面。This applies the custom rendering to the page. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#2)] 当您在浏览器中加载网页时, 您可以看到在该区域中呈现的`MyWebPartChrome` 控件上如何显示在类的源代码中所做的各种样式和其他呈现自定义。When you load the Web page in a browser, you can see how the various stylistic and other rendering customizations made in the source code of the `MyWebPartChrome` class appear on the controls rendered in the zone.

para.span: 如果要重写或服务器控件的特定部分的默认呈现, 请从类继承。

span.span: Inherit from the class when you want to override the default rendering of certain sections of or server controls.

para.span: 您可以选择重写方法 、 方法, 尤其是或方法, 以自定义呈现。

span.span: You can optionally override the method, the method, and especially the or methods, to customize the rendering.

para.span: 若要将自定义类用于区域中的控件, 请开发从类派生的自定义区域, 并重写其方法。

span.span: To use your custom class for the controls in a zone, develop a custom zone derived from the class, and override its method.

para.span: 有关如何在区域中使用子对象的详细信息, 请参阅 "示例" 部分。

span.span: For details on how to use a child object in a zone, see the Example section.
Web Parts Control Set Overview
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase zone, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager manager) cil managed
Public Sub New (zone As WebPartZoneBase, manager As WebPartManager)

span.span: The associated control.
The control on the current page.
Initializes a new instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化类的新实例。The initializes a new instance of the class. 它主要由区域在其方法中使用, 以创建对象的实例, 该对象处理 chrome 呈现以及区域中控件的任何自定义呈现。It is used primarily by a zone in its method to create an instance of the object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for controls in the zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了两种情况。The following code example demonstrates two things. 首先, 它通过重`MyWebPartChrome`写名`MyZone`为的派生区域中的方法来创建自定义类的新实例。First, it creates a new instance of the custom class `MyWebPartChrome` by overriding the method in a derived zone called `MyZone`. 其次, 在`MyWebPartChrome`类的构造函数中, 它将构造函数的参数中的对象分配给可在类中使用的私有字段。Second, in the constructor of the `MyWebPartChrome` class, it assigns the objects in the parameters of the constructor to private fields that can be used within the class. 因此, 此示例为您提供了一种在可访问 和属性之前访问关联区域和对象的方法。This example thus gives you a way to access the associated zone and object even in the constructor, before the and properties are accessible. 最后请注意, 若要使构造函数正常运行, 还必须在方法声明中调用基构造函数。Finally, note that for the constructor to work, the base constructor must also be invoked as part of the method declaration. 下面的代码包含两个自定义类。The following code contains the two custom classes. 有关运行示例所需的完整代码 (包括承载这些控件的网页), 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style CreateWebPartChromeStyle (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType chromeType);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style CreateWebPartChromeStyle(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType chromeType) cil managed

abstract member CreateWebPartChromeStyle : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style override this.CreateWebPartChromeStyle : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style

span.span: The control that is currently being rendered.

param.name: chromeType
param.span: 特定控件的 chrome 类型； 枚举值之一。

span.span: The type of chrome for a particular control; one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 创建样式对象，该对象为 对象呈现的每个 控件提供样式特性。

span.span: Creates the style object that supplies style attributes for each control rendered by the object.

returns.span: 包含 的样式特性的 。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象用来呈现控件的对象。 The method creates a object that is used by the object to render a control. 默认方法基于 `webPart`参数中引用的控件的属性值创建样式特性。The default method creates style attributes based on the property value of the control referenced in the `webPart` parameter. 选择控件时, 会出现一种特殊情况。A special situation occurs when a control is selected. 如果该页处于可选择控件的页显示模式下, 并且实际选择的是当前控件, 则默认方法还会将控件的样式信息与属性中的样式信息合并在一起。If the page is in a page display mode where controls can be selected, and the current control is actually selected, the default method also merges the style information of the control with the style information from the property. ## Examples 此代码示例演示如何使用方法。This code example demonstrates use of the method. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码示例部分演示如何重写方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 请注意, 它首先检索基方法创建的样式信息, 然后通过更改呈现的控件所用的字体来修改样式信息。Notice that it first retrieves the style information created by the base method, and then modifies the style information by changing the font used for the control being rendered. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#5)] 如果在浏览器中加载网页, 可以看到控件中使用的字体是在重写的方法中指定的字体。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can see that the font used in the controls is the one specified in the overridden method.

span.span: is .
is not one of the enumeration values.

para.span: 如果从类继承, 则可以选择重写方法, 并将基方法中的样式信息与要添加的自定义样式属性合并。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you can optionally override the method, and merge the style information from the base method with custom style attributes that you want to add.

para.span: 有关演示, 请参阅 "示例" 部分中的代码。

span.span: For a demonstration, see the code in the Example section.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 基于开发人员提供的条件，从呈现中排除特定谓词。

span.span: Excludes specific verbs from being rendered, based on criteria provided by a developer.

returns.span: 包含与 关联的所有谓词的 。

span.span: A containing all verbs associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法, 用于自动筛选与控件相关联的谓词集合中的某些谓词, 并阻止呈现筛选的谓词。 The method provides a way to automatically filter certain verbs from the collection of verbs associated with a control, and prevent the filtered verbs from being rendered.

span.span: The collection is .
- or -
is .

para.span: 如果创建自定义类, 可以选择重写方法, 以筛选出要呈现的特定谓词。

span.span: If you create a custom class, you can optionally override the method to filter out specific verbs from being rendered.

para.span: 执行此操作的最常见方法是创建一个私有方法, 该方法检查 控件集合中的谓词, 并根据你选择的条件确定是否应呈现每个谓词。

span.span: The most common way to do this is to create a private method that checks the verbs in the collection of a control and determines whether each verb should be rendered, based on criteria that you choose.

para.span: 请注意, 基方法提供了很多默认筛选条件, 如果您完全重写方法, 这会很难重现;如果只有几种特殊情况, 可能需要先调用基方法, 然后通过您自己的附加方法传递生成的集合, 以应用您的自定义筛选条件。

span.span: Note that the base method provides a lot of default filtering criteria that would be difficult to reproduce if you completely override the method; if you only have a few special cases, you might want to call the base method first, and then pass the resulting collection through your own additional method to apply your custom filtering criteria.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance string GetWebPartChromeClientID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 获取网页中呈现的 对象的客户端 ID。

span.span: Gets the client ID for the object as rendered in a Web page.

returns.span: 一个包含 对象的客户端 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the client ID for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法获取包含所呈现的的`webPart`表的客户端 ID。 The method gets the client ID of the table that contains the `webPart` being rendered. 该表是直接与对象相对应的呈现输出, 用作应用样式并为控件创建模块化布局的容器。The table is the rendered output that corresponds directly to the object, and is used as a container to apply styles and create a modular layout for the control. 如果要在 chrome 中更改对象的客户端 ID, 而不需要将页面回发到服务器, 则可以获取对象的客户端 ID。It is useful to get the client ID of the object for client-side scripting purposes, if you want to change something in the chrome without having to post the page back to the server.

span.span: is .
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance string GetWebPartTitleClientID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 获取表单元格的客户端 ID，该表单元格包含 控件的标题。

span.span: Gets the client ID for the table cell that contains the title for a control.

returns.span: 一个包含 标题的客户端 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the client ID for the title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索包含所呈现的`webPart`标题的表单元的客户端 ID 值。 The method retrieves the client ID value for the table cell that contains the title of the `webPart` being rendered. 方法用于获取的`webPart`标题单元格的客户端 ID 的一个重要方案是用于 Web 部件拖放功能。An important scenario in which the method is used to get the client ID of the title cell of the `webPart` is for the Web Parts drag-and-drop feature. 此方法对于其他客户端脚本编写也很有用。The method is also useful for other client-side scripting purposes. 例如, 您可以通过客户端脚本来更改单元格的标题或样式, 而不必将页面回发到服务器。For example, you could change the title or the style of the cell with client-side scripting, rather than having to post the page back to the server.

span.span: is .
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection GetWebPartVerbs(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 获取应使用 控件呈现的谓词的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of verbs that should be rendered with a control.

returns.span: 包含应使用 呈现的所有谓词的 。

span.span: A containing all the verbs that should be rendered with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使开发人员能够重写方法并排除某些谓词的呈现。The method provides developers with an opportunity to override the method and exclude certain verbs from being rendered. 这类似于方法, 该方法也可以排除呈现的谓词。This is similar to the method, which also can exclude verbs from being rendered. 但是, 如果您希望检查某些条件来确定是否呈现谓词, 则该方法不适用。However, the method is not meant for cases where you want to check some criteria to decide whether to render a verb. 相反, 当您事先知道始终需要排除某个谓词时, 此方法非常有用。Instead, this method is useful when you know in advance that you always want to exclude a certain verb. 例如, 如果您开发一个自定义类, 您可能会决定总是希望排除控件上的关闭谓词, 使用户永远不会关闭控件。For example, if you develop a custom class, you might decide that you always want to exclude the close verb on controls, so that users can never close the controls. `false` 您可以只重写方法,并排除在呈现自定义对象的任何控件上呈现的任何控件,而不是在所有控件上将属性设置为。Rather than setting the property to `false` on all the controls, you can simply override the method and exclude close verbs from being rendered on any control rendered with your custom object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码示例部分演示如何重写方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 重写的方法使用基方法来检索控件中的`webPart`所有谓词, 然后循环访问谓词集合, 将除关闭谓词之外的所有谓词添加到对象。The overridden method uses the base method to retrieve all verbs from the `webPart` control, then iterates through the verb collection, adding all verbs except the close verb to an object. 然后, 将这一集合的一组谓词分配给新的, 后者返回给调用方。This reduced set of verbs is then assigned to a new , which is returned to the caller. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#4)] 如果您在浏览器中加载网页, 然后单击每个控件的谓词菜单 (在标题栏中显示有向下箭头), 则您可以看到对于任何控件都不呈现 close 谓词。If you load the Web page in a browser and click the verbs menu (shown with a downward arrow in the title bar) of each control, you can see that the close verb is not rendered for any control.

abstract member RenderPartContents : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit override this.RenderPartContents : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit

span.span: The that receives the content.
The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈现 控件的主要内容区域，不包括页眉和页脚。

span.span: Renders the main content area of a control, excluding the header and footer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你可以重写的正文`webPart`区呈现, 同时将页眉和页脚呈现为默认呈现。 The method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `webPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码示例部分演示如何重写方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 重写的方法执行两个任务来自定义控件体的呈现。The overridden method does two things to customize the rendering for the body of the control. 首先, 它会检查以确定控件当前是否处于选中状态, 如果是, 则写出一个字符串并且不呈现内容。First, it checks to determine whether the control is currently selected, and if so, writes out a string and does not render the contents. 第二种情况下, 如果未选择控件, 并且控件的区域的类型`MyZone`为, 则该方法将呈现控件。Second, if the control is not selected, and if the control's zone is of type `MyZone`, the method renders the control. 如果您想要确保自定义类只可用于呈现特定类型区域中的控件, 而这些控件设计为包含对象, 则可以使用后一种检查。This latter check could be used if you wanted to ensure that a custom class can be used only to render controls in a specific type of zone that is designed to contain the object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果您在浏览器中加载网页, 您可以看到, 每个控件的内容都是正常呈现的。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can see that the content of each control is rendered normally. 如果将页面切换到设计模式 (通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**设计**"), 并将其中一个控件拖动到标记为 " **WebPartZone2**" 的空区域中, 则以不同方式呈现控件的内容。因为自定义对象不用于标准区域中的呈现。If you switch the page into design mode (by selecting **Design** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control) and drag one of the controls into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, the contents of the control are rendered differently, because the custom object is not being used for the rendering in a standard zone. 这与你尝试将自定义类与`MyZone`类除类之外的任何其他区域一起使用时的效果相同, 原因是前面的源代码。This is the same effect that you would achieve if you tried to use the custom class with any other zone besides the `MyZone` class, due to the preceding source code.

span.span: You can optionally override the method.

para.span: 如果是这样, 只需执行所需的任何呈现自定义, 然后调用其方法即可。

span.span: If so, you can simply perform whatever rendering customizations you want for , and then call its method.

para.span: 如果还想要在出现连接错误时依赖于默认呈现, 请先调用基方法, 然后自定义从基方法返回的 。

span.span: If you also want to rely on the default rendering in the event of connection errors, call the base method first, and then customize the that is returned from the base method.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void RenderWebPart (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RenderWebPart(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

abstract member RenderWebPart : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit override this.RenderWebPart : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit

span.span: The that receives the content.
The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈现完整的 控件及其所有部分。

span.span: Renders a complete control with all its sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将呈现完整的控件, 其中包含标题、内容和脚注。The method renders the complete control, with header, contents, and footer. 重写此方法可使开发人员以编程方式完全控制呈现`webPart`的所有方面, 因此, 重写此方法非常复杂。Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `webPart`, and for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex. 与开发人员可以重写的类中的某些其他方法一样, 如果重写此方法, 则一种常见的有用方法是先调用基方法, 获取返回的控件并自定义其一些属性,而不是自行处理完整的呈现。As with some other methods in the class that developers can override, if you override this method, a common and useful approach is to call the base method first, take the control that is returned, and customize some of its properties, rather than handling the complete rendering yourself.

span.span: The control that refers to is .
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对当前 实例的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the current instance.

value.span: 对网页上当前 的引用。

span.span: A reference to the current on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对页面上当前实例的引用。 The property provides a reference to the current instance on the page. ## Examples 此代码示例演示属性的用法。This code example demonstrates use of the property. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定当前呈现的控件是否是选定的控件, 在此示例中, 这意味着该页处于编辑视图中, 当前正在编辑控件。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the current control being rendered is the selected control, which in this example means that the page is in edit view, and the control is currently being edited. 如果满足这些条件, 则不会呈现控件的主体, 并且会在其位置写入一个字符串。If these conditions are true, the body of the control is not rendered, and a string is written in its place. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果在浏览器中加载网页, 则可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑**", 将页面切换到编辑模式。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 可以在任一控件的谓词菜单中单击 "编辑" 谓词;呈现页面时, 不会呈现所选的用于编辑的控件的主体。You can click the edit verb in the verbs menu of either of the controls; when the page is rendered, the body of the control selected for editing is not rendered. 但是, 如果将控件拖到标记为 " **WebPartZone2**" 的空区域中, 则将呈现控件的主体。However, if you drag the control into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, the body of the control is rendered. 这是因为第二个区域是标准区域, 在此示例中不使用自定义类来呈现控件。This is because the second zone is a standard zone, and it does not use the custom class in this example to render the controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Zone As WebPartZoneBase

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对关联的 区域的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the associated zone.

value.span: 对与 关联的 的引用。

span.span: A reference to a that is associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对区域的引用, 该区域包含对象为其提供呈现的控件。 The property provides a reference to the zone that contains the controls for which the object provides rendering. ## Examples 此代码示例演示属性的用法。This code example demonstrates use of the property. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定当前与对象关联的区域是否为类型`MyZone`的区域。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the zone currently associated with the object is a zone of type `MyZone`. 如果是, 则呈现控件的内容。If so, the control's contents are rendered. 此代码会阻止自定义对象处理除设计用于创建它的实例之外的任何其他区域。This code would prevent the custom object from working with any other zone besides the one designed to create an instance of it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果在浏览器中加载网页, 则会正常呈现每个控件的内容。If you load the Web page in a browser, the content of each control is rendered normally. 您可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**设计**", 将页面切换到设计模式。You can switch the page into design mode by selecting **Design** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 如果将一个控件拖动到标记为 " **WebPartZone2**" 的空区域中, 则其内容会以不同的方式呈现, 因为该自定义对象不用于呈现。If you drag one of the controls into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, its contents are rendered differently, because the custom object is not being used for the rendering. 这与你尝试将自定义类与`MyZone`类除类之外的任何其他区域一起使用的效果相同, 因为前面的源代码。This is the same effect that you would achieve if you tried to use the custom class with any other zone besides the `MyZone` class, because of the preceding source code.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
